about_the_game: Strike cold-blooded fear into the icy hearts of the Dark Wings with the 'Hair to the Throne' cosmetic pack for Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter! This set of six beards & hairstyles further customises Arlo as he embarks on a 'tail' of revenge across the wintery northern fringes of the Ratdom.
